Title: The Man without Gravity

Actors: Elio Germano, Michela Cescon, Elena Cotta, Silvia D'Amico
Plot: Oscar comes to light on a stormy night, in the hospital of a small town and immediately we understand that there is something extraordinary in him : Does not obey the law of gravity. It ...
